titleStmt.title: Moses and Iethro: or the good magistrate containing sundry necessary admonitions to all maiors, gouernours, and freemen of townes corporate, as they were deliuered in a sermon at S. Maries in Douer on the election day. By Io: Reading.
titleStmt.author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legatt for Robert Allott, and are to be sold in Pauls-Church-yard at the signe of the Gray-hound,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls-Church-yard at the signe of the Gray-hound
